original: // mdzes ma 'bum bskul bsdus pa bzhugs /
analyzed: mdzes ma bum skul sdud ba bzhugs

original: ma shar lho nub byang dbus mtshams na bzhugs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: ma char lho nub byang dbus mtshams na bzhugs ba mkha gro ma

original: sku mdog sngon mo ser mo dmar ljang mo dkar mo sna tshogs mdzes pa'i cha byad can //
analyzed: sku mdog sngon mo ser mo dmar ljang mo dkar mo sna tshogs mdzes ba cha byad can

original: 'khor yang sngon ser dmar ljang dkar sna tshogs mo mdzes ma 'bum gyis bskor //
analyzed: khor yang sngon ser dmar ljang dkar sna tshogs mo mdzes ma bum gyis skor

original: pad+ma sngon ser dmar ljang dkar sna tshogs mo'i gdan la bzhugs //
analyzed: pad+ma sngon ser dmar ljang dkar sna tshogs mo gdan la bzhugs

original: phyag na pad snod sngon po ser po dmar po ljang gu dkar po sna tshogs bsnams //
analyzed: phyag na pad snod sngon po ser po dmar po ljang gu dkar po sna tshogs snom

original: dbu la thor tshugs brgyan gyis brgyan //
analyzed: dbu la thor tshugs rgyan gyis rgyan

original: rgyan dang cha lugs mtshan dpe spras //
analyzed: rgyan dang cha lugs mtshan dpe spras

original: ma 'khor dang bcas pa khyed rnams la //
analyzed: ma khor dang cha ba khyed rnams la
tshogs kyi mchod ba di bul gyis

original: rgyan gyi gtor ma 'di bzhes la //
analyzed: rgyan gyi thor ma di bzhes la
bdag cag rnal byor khor cha kyi

original: rkyen dang bar chad zhi bar mdzod //
analyzed: rkyen dang ba chad zhi ba mdzod
